tags.name: Transaction API
tags.description:
Obtain the list of transactions for a CommBank account and details for each transaction. Transaction API is a consumer API. To access data you'll need the customer's consent. Seven years’ worth of transactions will be available for active accounts, starting from transactions dated 1 Jan 2017.

Host URL

CommBank requests are passed to the URL https://secure.api.commbank.com.au/api/cds-au/v1/banking

CBA – CommBiz requests are passed to the URL https://secure.cdr.commbiz.api.commbank.com.au/cbzapi/cds-au/v1/banking

get.description: Obtain transactions for a specific account

parameters.name: oldest-time
parameters.description: Constrain transactions with effective time (UTC) at or after this date/time.

parameters.name: newest-time
parameters.description: Constrain transactions with effective time (UTC) at or before this date/time.

parameters.name: min-amount
parameters.description: Filter transactions to only transactions with amounts higher or equal to than this amount.

parameters.name: max-amount
parameters.description: Filter transactions to only transactions with amounts less than or equal to this amount.

parameters.description: CommBank's unique identifier for this transaction.

ParamXFapiInterationId.name: x-fapi-interaction-id
ParamXFapiInterationId.description: Reflects the value of the Interaction ID in the request.

ParamXFapiAuthDate.name: x-fapi-auth-date
ParamXFapiAuthDate.description: The time when the customer last logged in to the data recipient.

ParamXFapiCustomerIpAddress.name: x-fapi-customer-ip-address
ParamXFapiCustomerIpAddress.description: The customer's original IP address if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient.

ParamXCdsClientHeaders.name: x-cds-client-headers
ParamXCdsClientHeaders.description: The customer's original standard http headers encoded, including the original User Agent header, if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient.

ParamPageSize.name: page-size
ParamPageSize.description: Number of records to return with the page

ParamAcceptHeader.name: Accept
ParamAcceptHeader.description: Content-Type that is acceptable for the server's response.

ParamXVHeader.name: x-v
ParamXVHeader.description: Version of the API end point being requested.

ParamXMinVHeader.name: x-min-v
ParamXMinVHeader.description: Minimum version of the API end point you are requesting.

ParamProductCategory.name: product-category
ParamProductCategory.description: Used to filter results on the productCategory field applicable to accounts. Any one of the valid values for this field can be supplied. If absent then all accounts returned.

transactionId.description: A unique ID of the transaction.

isDetailAvailable.description: True if extended information is available.

status.description: Status of the transaction whether pending or posted.

description.description: The transaction description as applied by CommBank.

postingDateTime.description: The time the transaction was posted.

valueDateTime.description:
Date and time at which assets become available to the account owner in case of a credit entry, or cease to be available to the account owner in case of a debit transaction entry.
CommBank does not currently return this value.

executionDateTime.description: The time the transaction was executed by the originating customer.

currency.description: The currency for the transaction amount.

reference.description: The reference for the transaction provided by the originating institution.

merchantName.description:
Name of the merchant for an outgoing payment to a merchant.
CommBank does not currently return this value.

merchantCategoryCode.description: The merchant category code (or MCC) for an outgoing payment to a merchant.

billerCode.description: BPAY Biller Code for the transaction.

billerName.description:
Name of the BPAY biller for the transaction.
CommBank does not currently return this value.

apcaNumber.description: 6 Digit APCA number for the initiating institution.

data.description:
Transfer to Jmcuxyz4
,PayID Phone from CommBank App
,Bill

endToEndId.description: An end to end ID for the payment created at initiation.

purposeCode.description:
Purpose of the payment.
CommBank does not currently return this value.

payee.description: Label of the target PayID. The name assigned to the BSB/Account Number or PayID (by the owner of the PayID).

extensionUType.description: Optional extended data provided specific to transaction originated via NPP.

service.description: Identifier of the applicable overlay service. Valid values are: X2P1.01.

self.description: Fully qualified link to this API call.
Fully qualified link to this API call.

first.description: URI to the first page of this set.

prev.description: URI to the previous page of this set.

next.description: URI to the next page of this set.

last.description: URI to the last page of this set.

totalRecords.description: Total number of records in the full set.

totalPages.description: Total number of pages in the full set.

totalRecords.description: The total number of records in the full set. See [pagination](#pagination).

totalPages.description: The total number of pages in the full set. See [pagination](#pagination).
